name: C. Brutality
statement:
You are playing a new famous fighting game: Kortal Mombat XII. You have
to perform a brutality on your opponent’s character.You are playing the
game on the new generation console so your gamepad have 26 buttons. Each
button has a single lowercase Latin letter from ” to ” written on it.
All the letters on buttons are pairwise distinct.You are given a
sequence of hits, the i-th hit deals a_i units of damage to the
opponent’s character. To perform the i-th hit you have to press the
button s_i on your gamepad. Hits are numbered from 1 to n.You know that
if you press some button k times then it’ll break. You cherish your
gamepad and don’t want to break any of its buttons.To perform a
brutality you have to land some of the hits of the given sequence. . The
total damage dealt is the sum of a_i over all i for the hits which
weren’t skipped..Your task is to skip some hits to deal the possible
total damage to the opponent’s character and not break your gamepad
buttons.
